title: The new Missions
body:
i have started the new Missions by selecting yauso icon to win with it a game But i didnot win with it so i changed it to riven icon  but i did not know that if i win with one icon i can;t change to the onther after so if you please can reset my Missions Progress and I can start Again From the Beginning because i don;t like to support riven in that :D 
thanks {{champion:36}}

replies.body: You can switch who you're representing by simply changing your icon and completed the next days' missions as Yasuo instead of Riven. Keep in mind that whichever icon you have selected is the team that you're supporting!
